description: System-generated unique identifier for this part-to-general-ledger mapping record.
Identifier of the inventory part/stock item in the fleet maintenance system that this accounting mapping applies to.
General ledger account code to which transactions for the specified part should be posted (e.g., purchases, issues, adjustments).
Indicator that this is the default GL account for the part when no more specific account is determined; likely a boolean flag (1=true). Confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the part–GL mapping, such as rationale or exceptions.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record, regardless of user.
Application-captured timestamp of the last user-driven modification; likely duplicates user_date_modified or is a legacy audit field—confirm with SME.
User ID that created this mapping record.
Timestamp when this mapping record was created by a user.
User ID of the most recent editor of this record.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated change to this record.
